title: 4 Rare 80s Albums [Part 25] New Wave
description:
And here's four more awesome records from the 80s, not that rare but still a bit hard to find. keep seeding people!


Freur - Get Us Out of Here [1985]

01 Look in the Back for Answers	 
02 Emeralds and Pearls	 
03 Kiss Me	 
04 A.O.K.O	 
05 The Devil and Darkness	 
06 The Piano Song	 
07 Happiness	 
08 Endless Groove	 
09 This Is the Way I'd Like to Live My Life	 
10 Bella Donna
11 Jazz is King	 

Members Rick Smith (keyboards, guitar), Carl Hyde (vocals, guitar), Bryn Burrows (drums), John Warwicker (synthesizers), Alfie Thomas (guitar)


John Foxx - Metamatic [1980]

01 Plaza  
02 He's a Liquid  
03 Underpass  
04 Metal Beat  
05 No-One Driving  
06 A New Kind of Man  
07 Blurred Girl  
08 030  
09 Tidal Wave  
10 Touch and Go  
11 Young Love
12 Film One
13 20th Century
14 Miles Away
15 A Long Time
16 Swimmer 1


The Nails - Mood Swing [1984]

01 Every Time I Touch You
02 Dark Brown  
03 88 Lines About 44 Women  
04 Home of the Brave  
05 Let It All Hang Out  
06 Mood Swing  
07 Phantom Heart  
08 Juanita, Juanita  
09 She Is Everything to Me  
10 White Wall  

Members Mark Campbell (vocals), George Kaufman (bass), Douglas Guthrie (saxophone), Mike Ratti (drums), Dennis McDermott (drums), Dave Kaufman (keyboards), Steve O'Rourke (drums)


The Passions - Thirty Thousand Feet Over China [1981]

01 I'm in Love With a German Film Star 
02 Someone Special 
03 The Swimmer 
04 Strange Affair 
05 Small Stones 
06 Runaway 
07 The Square 
08 Alice's Song 
09 Bachelor Girls 
10 Skin Deep
11 I Radiate (7'' Version)
12 Some Fun (7'' Version)
13 War Song (7'' Version)
14 Don't Talk To Me (I'm Shy) (7'' Version)

Members Barbara Gogan (vocals, guitar), Mitch Barker (vocals, 1978-79), Clive Timperley (guitar, vocals, 1978-81), Claire Bidwell (bass, vocals, 1978-80), Richard Williams (drums), David Agar (bass 1980-82), Kevin Armstrong (guitar, 1981-82), Jeff Smith (keyboards, 1981-82), Stephen Wright (guitar, 1982)
